scripts.build: tsc --build && npm run build:favicon && npm run build:demo -- --minify --one-file
scripts.build:favicon: for s in 1 2 3 4 12 32; do f=dist/public/favicon/favicon$(($s * 16)).png; aseprite src/demo/assets/favicon.aseprite --batch --color-mode=indexed --scale=$s --save-as=$f; zopflipng -y $f $f > /dev/null; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: ! git symbolic-ref --quiet HEAD || git push --follow-tags origin "$(git branch --show-current)"
scripts.start: tsc --build --preserveWatchOutput --watch& npm run build:favicon && npm run build:demo -- --watch& wait
scripts.test: npm run test:format && npm run test:unit && npm run build
scripts.version: npm pkg set published=$(date +%Y%m%d) && npm test
